name: OREGON ASSOCIATION OF HOSPITALS AND HEALTH SYSTEMS
description: trade association representing hospitals and health systems
sampleDescriptions: Advocate for extension of expiring Medicare provisions, extension of the Children's Health Insurance Program and against a payment cut in the 340B drug pricing program.
Monitor development of Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018, appropriations bills -- including Omnibus and continuing spending resolution to fund the government.
Advocate for opioid legislation and against a payment cut in the 340B drug pricing program.
Advocate for opioid legislation and against a payment cut in the 340B drug pricing program.
